meta.title: Arcle Design Direction
meta.author: Design Systems - Creative Direction
meta.intent: Translate the attached Arcle concept art into executable design DNA that AI and humans can apply consistently across product, marketing, and chat UI surfaces.

voice.style: Short sentences, declarative headlines, frictionless microcopy.

primary.name: Aurora Lime
primary.usage: Hero backdrops, CTA fills, icon badges, glow strokes.
primary.balance: Never exceed 40% of any frame; pair with deep charcoal to preserve contrast.

tertiary.name: Graphite Panel
tertiary.usage: Card surfaces, mid-tone dividers, muted buttons.

accents.name: Soft Mist
accents.usage: High-contrast blocks, data callouts, white cards.

accents.name: Signal White
accents.usage: Logo reverse, icon strokes, typography over Aurora Lime.

gradients.name: Aurora Horizon
gradients.usage: Large hero canvases behind photography or logo lockups.

typography.tracking: Tight (-1% to -3%) at display sizes to mimic poster typography.
rules: Hero headline splits line intentionally to emphasize verbs ('MONEY MOVE / FASTER IN / CHAT').
Numerals use tabular figures when showing rates or balances.

application.grid_gap: 24px between cards in desktop mosaic, 16px on tablet.

spacing.philosophy: High tension between dense typography blocks and generous negative space.

imagery.style: High-contrast portrait photography with silhouetted subjects facing right, illuminated by Aurora Lime rim lights.
treatments: Use feathered masks to fade into background gradient.
Never show busy environments; isolate subject on void.
imagery.usage: Only one photographic subject per frame; everything else remains vector or typographic.

logo.mark: Rounded square with centered 'A' arrow-cut motif.
logo.alignment: Mark is optically centered vertically and horizontally.

system.fill_usage: Use solid fills only on action buttons; elsewhere keep icons as punched-out silhouettes.

layout_principles.grid: 12-column fluid grid with 160px max gutter on XL, 1200px content lockup for hero mosaic.
layout_principles.card_system: Nested rounded-rectangle tiles (20px radius) stacked in collage. Alternate sizes to create rhythm.
hierarchy: Logo tiles repeat to establish recognition.
Bold typographic block sits on stark white tile to punctuate message.
Color swatches or icon chips fill negative space.

motion.behavior: Slow drift parallax on hero cards (4–8px). Buttons snap quickly (120ms) with cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.3, 1).
motion.micro: Hover lifts cards by 4px with soft shadow (#000000 / 25% blur 24).

components.name: HeroBillboard
components.purpose: Primary acquisition hero communicating speed + innovation.
structure: Left 60%: gradient canvas with silhouette portrait or product render.
Right 40%: stacked card mosaic containing logo, colors, typography specimen.

visual_direction.background: Aurora Horizon gradient fading to Carbon Void edges.
visual_direction.type: Ultra-bold Inter with extreme kerning; align text flush left.
visual_direction.photography: Subject facing toward headline to guide gaze.

states.dark_mode: Invert cards to Carbon + Aurora outlines; maintain white typography tile.

rules: Never place more than one block of body copy inside hero.
Always include tagline 'Money move faster in chat' in at least one card.

components.name: LogoBadge
components.purpose: Brand anchor used across navigation, chat badges, and tiles.

structure.content: Centered A-mark sized to 60% of container height.

fills: Aurora Lime fill with Carbon Void mark
Carbon Void fill with Signal White mark

usage_rules: Keep badge alone on tiles or pair with short label below.

components.name: TypographyPanel
components.purpose: Showcase bold messaging in marketing blocks and chat promos.

structure.container: Pure white or Soft Mist tile with 20px radius.
structure.text: Stacked words broken by manual line returns for rhythm.

visual_direction.type_scale: Clamp between 48px and 96px depending on viewport.
visual_direction.contrast: Use Carbon Void text only; never colorize headline.

rules: Each line should feature one verb or noun.
Maintain consistent left alignment even within mosaic.

components.name: ColorSwatchTile
components.purpose: Communicate palette quickly across product surfaces.

structure.split: Top 70% color fill, bottom 30% Carbon label bar.

visual_direction.shadow: Optional inner shadow for tactile feel.

usage_rules: Always include at least three palette tiles in hero collage.
Use as legend inside design system docs and color pickers.

components.name: ChatCTA
components.purpose: Bridge marketing story to in-product chat experience.

structure.container: Aurora Lime tile with centered CTA button or copy.
structure.button: Carbon Void fill, rounded pill (radius 999px), Inter 600 uppercase.

visual_direction.copy: Invite direct action: 'Open the chat', 'Move funds now'.

states.hover: Invert to Carbon background with Aurora outline (2px).

rules: Never mix more than two colors in CTA.
Place CTA adjacent to headline tile for narrative continuity.

components.name: ChatInterfaceCard
components.purpose: In-product chat module reflecting hero aesthetics.

bubble_style.user: Aurora Lime outline 1px, transparent fill, Inter 500.
bubble_style.assistant: Graphite Panel fill with Signal White text.

structure.input: Rounded pill with dual-tone gradient border and minimal icons.

visual_direction.glow: Subtle neon glow under assistant bubbles (0 0 18px Aurora).
visual_direction.typography: Keep replies concise; emphasize numbers in bold.

interaction.focus: Input border animates from Aurora to Signal White over 300ms.

rules: Chat area should feel like floating tile within void; drop shadow 0 12px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.65).
Never use pure white backgrounds inside chat to maintain cinematic vibe.

components.name: StatCapsule

visual_direction.divider: 2px Aurora Lime dot separating label and value.

usage_rules: Align capsules along card edges or overlay on photography.

components.name: TestimonialTile

content: Quote text Inter 500 18px, Signal White color.
Client name Inter 600 14px uppercase in Aurora Lime.

visual_direction.marks: Use logo badge watermarked at 12% opacity bottom right.

rules: Pair with StatCapsules to reinforce proof.

design_principles: Contrast is the hero: bright finance energy against black void.
Every frame tells a story about speed; remove anything that slows the read.
Repetition builds trust—reuse the badge, the lime, the type system deliberately.
Cards behave like tangible hardware; respect consistent radii and clean shadows.
Chat should feel like a premium control room, not a casual messenger.

tokens.css: Expose colors, spacing scale, and typography as CSS variables or design tokens for easy theming.

responsiveness: Collapse tile collage into vertical stack on <= 768px while preserving alternating color rhythm.
Ensure tap targets remain >48px with consistent pill buttons.
accessibility: Maintain minimum 4.5:1 contrast (Aurora on Carbon, Carbon on Soft Mist).
Provide text alternatives for photography tiles (describe innovation + finance).
Support reduced motion by disabling parallax and glow pulses when prefers-reduced-motion is true.
